title: batch matrix-vector multiplication (bmv)
body_html:
I checked the documentation online. It appears that although there are methods for
batch matrix multiplication, there does not seem to have one for batch matrix-vector multiplication?
I guess it is not difficult to implement this, since we can just squeeze the 2D tensor representing the batch vector into 3D and then do bmm, but it would be really convenient to have one.

body:
I checked the documentation online. It appears that although there are methods for 
batch matrix multiplication, there does not seem to have one for batch matrix-vector multiplication?
I guess it is not difficult to implement this, since we can just squeeze the 2D tensor representing the batch vector into 3D and then do `bmm`, but it would be really convenient to have one.
